movies.title: Stranger Things
movies.director: The Duffer Brothers, Shawn Levy, Uta Briesewitz
movies.description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one strange little girl. Watch all you want. This nostalgic nod to '80s sci-fi and horror classics has earned dozens of Emmy nominations, including three for Outstanding Drama

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.description: Shutter Island is a novel by American writer Dennis Lehane, published by HarperCollins in April 2003. It is about a U.S. Marshal who goes to an isolated hospital for the criminally insane to investigate the disappearance of a patient who is a multiple murderer.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

movies.title: Stranger Things 2
movies.director: The Duffer Brothers, Shawn Levy, Uta Briesewitz
movies.description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one strange little girl. Watch all you want. This nostalgic nod to '80s sci-fi and horror classics has earned dozens of Emmy nominations, including three for Outstanding Drama
